## R Markdown

Testing axe js lib



```{js axe}
axe
  .run()
  .then(results => {
    if (results.violations.length) {
      throw new Error('Accessibility issues found');
    }
  })
  .catch(err => {
    console.error('Something bad happened:', err.message);
  });
```
